title: Marketing Executive
experience_required: Experience in developing and implementing marketing strategies, project management skills, analytical and problem-solving abilities, experience in content creation and management, strong understanding of social media platforms and their analytics
description:
The Marketing Executive will be responsible for establishing the company as a thought leader in the industry, growing public awareness of the company, and communicating the company's mission and values to the public. They will develop and implement a marketing strategy, manage the day-to-day operations of the company's marketing department, and oversee marketing campaigns. The Marketing Executive will report to the Marketing Manager.

The key responsibilities of the Marketing Executive include developing the department's marketing calendar, workflows, and content team's "course of action". They will also analyze various types of data to build content strategies and review each piece of content before it goes live to ensure it meets quality standards and is error-free. The Marketing Executive will also promote content and track and measure its performance.

The ideal candidate for this role will have experience in developing and implementing marketing strategies, strong project management skills, and excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities. They should also have experience in content creation and management and a strong understanding of social media platforms and their analytics. Desirable criteria include experience in the same or similar industry, experience in managing a team, knowledge of SEO and digital marketing techniques, and experience in data analysis and reporting.

  • Competitive salary (Band 5)
  • Full-time, permanent contract
  • Located in the UK

title: Care Team Coordinator
experience_required: Previous experience in a similar role
description:
The Care Team Coordinator will be responsible for coordinating scheduling for care staff, supervising care plans and ensuring compliance, serving as the main point of contact between clients and staff, and updating digital care logs and managing staff documentation. title: Night Shift Cleaner
experience_required: Previous experience in a cleaning role
description:
The Night Shift Cleaner will be responsible for maintaining cleanliness and sanitation in various areas of The Cock Inn. This includes cleaning and sanitizing, waste disposal, surface cleaning, maintaining cleanliness, reporting any safety hazards, and performing deep cleaning tasks. The role may also involve supervising and coordinating the activities of other cleaning staff.

The Night Shift Cleaner reports to the Manager and is responsible for ensuring that all areas of The Cock Inn are kept clean and sanitized. They must have good communication skills and attention to detail in order to follow safety procedures and maintain cleanliness. The role may also involve supervising and coordinating the activities of other cleaning staff.

The ideal candidate for this role will have previous experience in a cleaning role and the ability to work night shifts. They must also have good communication skills and attention to detail. Desirable criteria include supervisory experience, experience with deep cleaning tasks, knowledge of health and safety regulations, experience in a hospitality or food service environment, and a basic understanding of cleaning equipment and products.

  • Competitive salary in Band 2
  • Full-time, permanent contract
  • Night shift hours

title: Sous Chef
qualifications_required: Formal culinary training or relevant qualifications
experience_required: Previous experience as a Sous Chef or similar role
description:
The role of Sous Chef at our company is a vital one, responsible for ensuring that our dishes are prepared, cooked, and presented to the highest standards. This role also involves overseeing kitchen operations and supporting the Head Chef in leading the kitchen team. The Sous Chef must maintain food quality, consistency, and safety at all times, while also upholding our high standards of hygiene, cleanliness, and organisation.

The key responsibilities of this role include preparing and cooking dishes to company standards, supervising and training junior kitchen staff, monitoring stock levels and placing orders, and assisting with menu development and daily specials. The Sous Chef will report to the Head Chef and must adhere to all food safety and health & safety regulations.

To be considered for this role, candidates must have previous experience as a Sous Chef or in a similar role, as well as a strong knowledge of food safety and health & safety regulations. Excellent cooking skills and the ability to train and supervise junior staff are also essential. Formal culinary training or relevant qualifications are desirable, as well as experience in menu development and stock management. A passion for food and creativity in the kitchen are also highly valued qualities.

  • Competitive salary within Band 5
  • Full-time, permanent contract
  • 40-48 hours per week
  • Location: [insert location here]

title: Head Chef
experience_required: Previous experience as a Head Chef or similar role
description:
The Head Chef will be responsible for overseeing all aspects of the kitchen, including menu development, staff management, inventory control, food quality, financial management, hygiene and safety, problem solving, communication, and creativity. They will lead a team of kitchen staff and ensure the highest standards of quality, taste, and presentation are met. This is a volunteer position at The Cock Inn.

The Head Chef will report to the management team and will be responsible for leading a team of kitchen staff. They will oversee menu development, staff training, inventory control, and financial management. The Head Chef will also be responsible for maintaining high standards of food quality, taste, and presentation. They will need to communicate effectively with the team and use their problem-solving skills to handle any challenges that may arise.

The ideal candidate for this role will have previous experience as a Head Chef or in a similar role, strong leadership and management skills, excellent communication and problem-solving abilities, knowledge of food safety and hygiene regulations, and a passion for culinary arts. Formal culinary training or qualifications, experience in menu development and cost control, knowledge of current food trends and industry standards, and experience in a high-volume kitchen are desirable. The candidate must also be able to work flexible hours and weekends.

  • Volunteer position at The Cock Inn
  • Competitive salary of ÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂ£25,000
  • Full-time, permanent role
  • Located in the UK

title: Senior Carer
experience_required: Experience in a care role, supervisory experience, understanding of person-centered care planning, excellent communication skills
description:
The Senior Carer will be responsible for providing direct care to residents, managing medication administration, supervising and supporting care assistants, contributing to care planning, monitoring and reporting on residents' health, maintaining accurate records, communicating with residents and their families, supporting training and development, responding to emergencies, and maintaining a safe and positive care environment. This role is a full-time, permanent position located in the UK with a salary of ÃÂÃÂ£25,000-ÃÂÃÂ£30,000 per year (Band 5).

The Senior Carer reports to the Care Manager and is responsible for overseeing and supporting care assistants, ensuring proper medication administration, contributing to care planning, and maintaining a safe and positive care environment. They will also be responsible for communicating with residents and their families and responding to emergencies.

The ideal candidate for this role will have experience in a care role, with the ability to administer medication correctly and safely. They should also have previous supervisory experience and a strong understanding of person-centered care planning. Excellent communication skills are essential for this role. Desirable criteria include experience in a senior care role, training and development, emergency response, and knowledge of health and safety regulations.

  • Competitive salary of ÃÂÃÂ£25,000-ÃÂÃÂ£30,000 per year
  • Full-time, permanent position
  • Opportunities for training and development

title: Care Assistant
experience_required: Experience in providing personal care and support to individuals
description:
The Care Assistant role is responsible for providing personal care, mobility support, meal preparation, medication management, household tasks, companionship and emotional support, monitoring and reporting, following care plans, promoting independence, and ensuring safety and well-being for individuals in their homes. This role requires a compassionate and dedicated individual who is committed to promoting the dignity and comfort of those in their care.

Reporting to the Team Leader, the Care Assistant will be responsible for providing personal care and support to individuals, ensuring their safety and well-being, and promoting their independence. They will also be responsible for following care plans, monitoring and reporting any changes or concerns, and working collaboratively with the team to provide high-quality care.

The ideal candidate for this role will have experience in providing personal care and support to individuals, excellent communication and interpersonal skills, and an understanding of health and safety regulations. They must also be able to work 36 hours per week and have a compassionate and empathetic nature. Desirable criteria include previous experience in a similar role, relevant qualifications or certifications, knowledge of medication administration, experience in working with elderly or vulnerable individuals, and the ability to work independently and as part of a team.

  • Competitive salary of ÃÂ£22,000 per annum
  • Full-time, permanent contract
  • 36 hours per week
  • Location: UK

title: Night Shift Cleaner
qualifications_required: Previous experience in a cleaning role
experience_required: Ability to work night shifts, Good communication skills, Attention to detail, Basic understanding of health and safety regulations
description:
The Night Shift Cleaner will be responsible for cleaning and sanitizing various areas, including sweeping, mopping, dusting, vacuuming, and cleaning restrooms and kitchens. They will also be in charge of waste disposal, surface cleaning, and maintaining overall cleanliness of the designated areas.

The role may also involve reporting any safety hazards, deep cleaning tasks, and supervising other cleaning staff.

Successful candidates will ideally have previous experience in a cleaning role and demonstrate good communication, attention to detail, and an understanding of health and safety regulations.

• Previous cleaning experience
• Ability to work night shifts
• Good communication skills
